data.alt: How to Prepare for Jobs that Don't Exist - Sidu Ponnappa
data.heading: How to Prepare for Jobs that Don't Exist - Sidu Ponnappa
data.text: The future is getting stranger and reality is a harsh mistress. The extent of automation and reduced human intervention in creating software underscores the need for today's programmers to continuously learn, read and hone their craft. Watch the video for more

data.alt: Gojek x Google Next 2018 - Ajey Gore
data.heading: Gojek x Google Next 2018 - Ajey Gore
data.text: Despite the disability Mr. Sumani has, he is still consistent in helping other people. Let us learn from Mr. Sumani that no matter what our weakness may be, we should always be willing to  contribute to our surroundings..

data.alt: Tech in Asia Singapore 2018 'How to Experiment with Product Improvements' - Crystal Widjaja
data.heading: Tech in Asia Singapore 2018 'How to Experiment with Product Improvements' - Crystal Widjaja
data.text: Debuting on stage with a scooter in Google Cloud Next '18, Ajey (our CTO) shared how Gojek scaled its impact with the help of Google technology. Ajey shared how Google Maps enabled our driver partners to pick up customers accurately and provide accurate estimates of food delivery times.

data.heading: Tech Challenges at Gojek
data.text: At Gojek, the breadth of technologies as well as the (rapidly growing) volume of data makes every single day challenging. If youâ€™re passionate about technology and are looking for something unpredictable and challenging, Gojek is THE place for you.

data.heading: CODE AT SCALE - Shobhit Srivastava
data.text: #CODEATSCALE - Watch how Shobhit, our Product Engineer, takes us through his journey into changing people's lives at Gojek.

data.heading: DESIGN AT SCALE - Fatema Raja
data.text: #DESIGNATSCALE - At Gojek, design is used to drive impact at scale. With over 100 million downloads and over 100 million monthly orders, the app depends on design-thinking to continue evolving. See how Fatema, our Product Designer, discovered this as she joined the company.

data.heading: CREATE AT SCALE - Arlinda Juwitasari
data.text: #CREATEATSCALE - A personal experience inspires Arlinda to build products for millions of GO-JEK drivers. Check out what motivates this young Product Manager to drive impact at scale

data.alt: Meet The Head of GO-LIFE : Dayu Dara
data.heading: Meet The Head of GO-LIFE : Dayu Dara
data.text: Winston Churchill once said that failure isnâ€™t fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts. SVP at GOJEK, Head of GO-LIFE, Dayu Dara Permata, doesnâ€™t stop when she failed to pursue medical school. She would never have guessed that her failure led to the beginning of something great.

data.alt: GOJEK x DSW 'AI-Powered Business: How Go-Jek Empowers Many Peopleâ€™s Life' - Kevin Aluwi
data.heading: GOJEK x DSW 'AI-Powered Business: How Go-Jek Empowers Many Peopleâ€™s Life' - Kevin Aluwi
data.text: Kevin Aluwi explained how the data could open up opportunities to build the country and help the people at Data Science Weekend 2018

data.heading: Engineer's Life at GO-JEK
data.text: Taufan Aero (Tech Lead, Back-End), Bherly (Tech Lead, iOS) and Crystal Widjaja (VP Business Intelligence) will share their experience working at GO-JEK.

data.alt: How Does Business Intelligence Work? Muhammad AdrianðŸ’¡ GO-LEARN
data.heading: How Does Business Intelligence Work? Muhammad AdrianðŸ’¡ GO-LEARN
data.text: The term Business Intelligence might sound foreign to some people. What is Business Intelligence? What do they do, and what are their roles? Watch GO-LEARN video with Muhammad Adrian (Head of Driver Growth and Performance) to understand what actually Business Intelligence is.

data.alt: The Principles of User Interface. Reza NovriansyahðŸ’¡ GO-LEARN
data.heading: The Principles of User Interface. Reza NovriansyahðŸ’¡ GO-LEARN
data.text: What does User Interface (UI) do other than making the look of an application more beautiful and nicer? Reza Novriansyah (UXD Interaction Designer at GO-JEK) believes that UI designers also have to understand the User Experience (UX), such as the product or media platform that users use, who is the product for, what is the problem, and what is the solution.

data.alt: Understanding Data Science and Why Itâ€™s So Important. Misrab Faizullah-KhanðŸ’¡GO-LEARN
data.heading: Understanding Data Science and Why Itâ€™s So Important. Misrab Faizullah-KhanðŸ’¡GO-LEARN
data.text: Lately, data science is very booming because of every decision making that a company make should be based on data. However, from the hype of data science has its upsize and downsize. In this video, Misrab Faizullah-Khan (VP of Data Science at GO-JEK) will provide a brief understanding of the data science and why it is important for GO-JEK. He will also share a few reference for those of you who want to get into the world of data science.

data.alt: Giri Hariztio - It's Not About You
data.heading: Giri Hariztio - It's Not About You
data.text: One of the most important things to remember about working is that you don't work only for yourself, but for other people as well.
